content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --MODIFY
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0099
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error if --TRT represents an alteration to the collected value
  for coding purposes and --MODIFY is null
Outcome:
  Message: --MODIFY is null when --TRT represents an alteration to the collected value.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0099
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: A value which represents an alteration to a collected
                  value for coding purposes. Synonym Qualifier of --TRT.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --MODIFY
                Section: Interventions
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - INTERVENTIONS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - CM
      - SU

json.Description: Trigger error if --TRT represents an alteration to the collected value for coding purposes and --MODIFY is null

Outcome.Message: --MODIFY is null when --TRT represents an alteration to the collected value.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: A value which represents an alteration to a collected value for coding purposes. Synonym Qualifier of --TRT.
